release.description: First public release working against Share 3.2r
release.action: Support for Alfresco Share Closes issue 17 (http://code.google.com/p/maven-alfresco-archetypes/issues/detail?id=17")
Tested against a non localhost Alfresco server
Incapsulated jetty run in the -Prun profile, which runs by default jetty during the integration-test phase
